original_text: So I was very upset when I thought about all my hard work on the earth. So I was very upset when I thought about all my hard work on the earth.
korean_text: 이러므로 내가 해 아래에서 한 모든 수고에 대하여 내가 내 마음에 실망하였도다

sentences.original_text: when I thought about all my hard work
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 모든 수고에 대해 생각할 때
